June 2, 1883 D Westleigh Contest
Westleigh Contest 0 Other
westleigh-contest
None
Hallelujah Chorus [arr. Round]
Cricket Field, near Sovereign Pit, Leigh The test piece was Wright and Round's arrangement of the Hallelujah Chorus and a Quadrille selection of their own choosing. Prizes - 1st £10, 2nd £6, 3rd £3, 4th £1.10s. Promoted by West Leigh Brass Band.
Oct. 22, 2012, 8:47 p.m. Oct. 18, 2019, 9:46 a.m.
1 Radcliffe Old Band Alexander Owen
2 Southport Rifles Band Harry Round
3 Besses o' th' Barn George Fred Birkenshaw
4 Rochdale Old Edwin Swift
